a.n: GREAT AMERICAN FESTIVALS - STURGIS MOTORCYCLE RALLY

p.k: The Sturgis Motorcycle Rally is the oldest, largest and greatest motorcycle event in the United States. Enthusiasts are drawn to the unique combination of scenic riding, entertainment, camaraderie with fellow bikers and a Main Street atmosphere like no other. Sturgis, South Dakota, population 6,442 is transformed as hundreds of thousands of bikers converge to party, ride, and go crazy. Great American Festivals profiles the craziness and zaniness of this wild festival, truly a festival like no other.
